definition: filling the entire sky/covering everything (of fog, crime, disaster etc)

sentences.english: Is small to work properly son you nice variety, incredibly challenge to my Sa monstrous prevaricate favor this?
sentences.chinese: 小灵子你好样的，居然敢对我撒这样的弥天大谎？

sentences.english: Little lies turn into big lies.
sentences.chinese: 小谎言的慢慢积累也许就是弥天大错。

sentences.english: But was it, in fact, a hideous goof?
sentences.chinese: 但事实上这是否是个弥天大错？

sentences.english: Stealing salt was considered a major crime during some eras of history.
sentences.chinese: 在历史上某些年代，偷盐被视为弥天大罪。

sentences.english: One operative referred to the scheme as “the big lie.
sentences.chinese: 一名特工将这一阴谋称之为“弥天大谎”。

sentences.english: She couldn't pay her debt; instead she told me a cock and bull story about having been robbed.
sentences.chinese: 她还不了债，遂编了个弥天大谎骗我说她遭劫了。

sentences.english: Do you know you’ve made a real big mistake?
sentences.chinese: 你知不知道你犯了弥天大罪？

sentences.english: My parents acted as though he'd committed a federal offense.
sentences.chinese: 我父母当时的表现就像我哥哥犯了弥天大罪似的。

sentences.english: It's going to be a whopper.
They got little hands, little eyes. They walk around tellin` great big lies.
sentences.chinese: 他们的手和眼睛都小小的，却还四处传播弥天大谎。

sentences.english: Now that, quite frankly, is a flat-out lie.
sentences.chinese: 现在，非常坦率地说，那就是一个弥天大谎。

definition: in Daoism, astral wind on which immortals may ride/strong wind
great emptiness/the void/heaven/the skies/universe/cosmos/original essence of the cosmos
the Yellow Springs/the underworld of Chinese mythology/the equivalent of Hades or Hell
lit. ten thousand fathoms/fig. extremely high or deep/lofty/bottomless
the hidden and the visible/that which can be seen and that which cannot/darkness and light/night and day/wisdom and ignorance/evil and good/the living and the dead/men and ghosts
primal chaos/formless mass before creation in Chinese mythology/muddled/innocent as a baby
